chunk_id: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC__chunk_200
source: Care During Pregnancy and Childbirth Training Manual for CHO at AB-HWC
text:
fruit juices, table sugar, starchy vegetables, etc. 
should be avoided 
 ∙ Carbohydrate foods should be spread through the day over 3 small meals and 2-3 snacks 
each day to maintain blood glucose levels 
 ∙ Fried foods should be avoided. Instead serve steamed, boiled or sautéed food 
 ∙ Whole fruits should be preferred over juices 
 ∙ Prefer fish or chicken over red or organ meat 
 ∙ Fibre should be increased in the diet by including salad, beans, non- starchy vegetables, 
whole fruit, whole g
